David Saff wrote:

> J. B. Rainsberger wrote:
>  >
>  > I am not a Microsoft basher any more, but I still believe that
>  > SourceSafe is actually /worse/ than no version control. I feel similarly
>  > about ClearCase, although not as strongly.
> 
> Well, it's good to know that the market follows reason: "Nothing at all"
> still leads every other version-control strategy in market share.

Thanks for that. I laughed aloud, and I'm sure it's not just because of 
the Meridian Chardonnay I'm drinking.
